params.roundId: The round ID for which to get the answer.

returns._0: The answer previously set with setAnswer().

params._roundId: The ID of the round to retrieve data for.

returns._0: roundId The ID of the round.
returns._1: answer The answer for the round.
returns._2: startedAt The timestamp when the round started.
returns._3: updatedAt The timestamp when the round was last updated.
returns._4: answeredInRound The ID of the round in which the answer was computed.

params.roundId: The round ID for which to retrieve the timestamp.

returns._0: The timestamp when the round was last updated.
The latest answer, with a precision of 8 decimal (USD decimals).
roundId The ID of the latest round.
returns._1: answer The answer provided in the latest round.
returns._2: startedAt The timestamp when the latest round started.
returns._3: updatedAt The timestamp when the latest round was updated.
returns._4: answeredInRound The round in which the latest answer was provided.

returns._0: The latest timestamp of when the round was updated, in seconds (UTC).

setAnswer(int256).details: Only callable by the BIG_TIMELOCK_ADMIN role.

params.answer: The answer to be set with a precision of 8 decimal (USD decimals).

description().notice: Returns the description of the contract.

getAnswer(uint256).notice: Retrieves the answer for a given round ID.

getRoundData(uint80).notice: Retrieves the data for a specific round.

getTimestamp(uint256).notice: Retrieves the timestamp of a given round ID.

latestAnswer().notice: Retrieves the latest answer from the oracle.

latestTimestamp().notice: Retrieves the latest timestamp of the round data.

setAnswer(int256).notice: Sets the answer for the current round.

version().notice: This function provides the version number of the contract.
